title: United States - annual real GDP 1990 to 2019
yAxis: GDP in billion chained (2012) U.S. dollars
summary: Overall GDP in billion chained (2012) U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

GDP in billion chained (2012) U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 1999 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2001, slightly increasing from 2001 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, and lastly gradually increasing from 2008 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum GDP in billion chained (2012) U.S. dollars, about 19072.5 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest GDP in billion chained (2012) U.S. dollars, of value 12610.5 was reported at Year 1999
